reviewText:
Okay, let's start with first principles, what do you want from a women in prison film? No, not the plot, that's always the same even in real horrible ones, good girl(s) gets unjustly imprisoned, good guys/girls work hard on the outside and eventually prevail over evil warden/guards and/or the inmates escape, blah blah blah, who cares. I'm talking sleaze points here. First, we need an entry scene where the good girl gets stripped, examined and abused, if we're lucky, maybe hosed down, something like that. Second, she's introduced to the population and gets lezzed out or abused. Third, she meets the evil guard/warden and gets lezzed out or abused, preferably both, like first abused after refusing to lez out. Fourth, she breaks the rules and gets abused, preferably whipped. Oh yeah, and shower scenes, with multiple girls and plenty of soapy skin. Did I forget anything? Maybe a bonus extra, like the amazing "pins" scene in "Wicked Warden" if we're extra lucky.

So, how does this really awful film by any other measure (with absurd music) stack up on the five sleaze essentials? Well, it's a little out of order, because we have no entry scene, but we got a multiple hosing scene where the flimsy shifts they're wearing get partially peeled off by the water; a partially dressed beating scene (short) combined with some kind of nude water torture; a nude dead body; warden lezzing out in office (short, topless only); a nude rinse the carpet scene; a nude cavity search followed by doctor in office dual nude lez and plastic porker scene (R rated); cell mates lez out; a bouncing soapy shower scene with leering guards including shower lez; another nude exam scene with the lez doctor; a second bouncy batch of inmates in the shower; inmate lezzing with plastic, soft x this time, but brief; nude outdoor gymnastics; throw the nude inmate in the hole scene; warden checks out nude inmate in office followed by intense lezzing; more inmate lezzing . . . and it goes on and on, it even gets x rated briefly during the escape/retribution stuff in the last half hour.

Only complaint? Too much lez, not enough brutality (very little whipping), but still, you have to give it five sleaze stars, especially for the NTRL factor added on (nudity to total running length). Best women in prison flick yet, with some striped backs it could have topped the genre for all time. But there's still room for a really nasty one with whippings, hangings, everything. And maybe even the bad guys win!

The story line for this movie is a good basic erotic fiction theme.  The mild BDSM is good.  Some of the activiteis of the girls at the end of the movie is a bit gross, but is in keeping with the theme of the movie.  The pace of the movie is ok and shows key scenes in a good manner. If you like naked female prisoners you will like this movie.

If you like lots of nudity then you just may like this movie. However,if you are looking for some sort of storyline with a decent plot you will not find it in this one. The acting is atrocious with the cast doing little more than reciting lines in many cases. Definitely one for the dustbin.

I guess back in 1980 this one was groundbreaking, but today it comes across as a very so-so women-in-prison film.  The scenes involving women with other women are disappointing and not at all erotic.  Yes, there's some nudity, but not much else.  There's a lot of violence, but it's mostly stupid stuff that is supposed to look real but looks pathetic instead.

There's one interesting scene near the beginning where the female warden entertains a wealthy woman, showing her a pretty female inmate she can purchase for her own pleasure.  A great idea, but later, once she actually owns the girl, their scenes together are bland and unimaginative.  And finally, after the girl has tried to run away one too many times, she drowns her in a really fakey scene on the beach.  Like I said, unerotic and pathetic.

If you have a thing for women behind bars, group showering, and light S&M then this movie is for you.  I don't know what state funds this prison, but the clothing budget seems to be falling a little short.  Also, what's up with the penis' being cut off?  It's pretty obvious that someone involved in the making of this film hated men.

I am not a fan of WIP (Women-In-Prison) movies. Generally I find them numbingly boring and falling far short of their sensationalistic claims. My preference in WIP movies is for hard and nasty scenes. Oswaldo De Oliveira's "Bare Behind Bars" goes the opposite route, highlighting camp and comedy. Given its limitations, it is still miles above the normal drivel. However, like other WIP movies, it doesn't live up top its promise of "brutal beatings, steamy showers, vicious violence and savage sexuality."

It is more laugh-out-loud funny than erotic. It is very tongue-in-cheek and doesn't take itself seriously for an instant. The acting is deliberately bad, over-the-top and cartoonish. And that is actually its saving grace, because it makes you laugh at the silliness of it all. Just sample the scene of the horny inmates using a makeshift pulley to slowly winch a dildo in between their cells at night. Or the wacky ether-addicted nurse who tries to take the Warden's blood pressure by wrapping the cuff around her neck. Or her buttock-grinding scene with her inmate lover which culminates with her introduction of the infamous pineapple dildo.

Thankfully the women in this prison are almost all deliciously hot and spend most of the time happily naked. And that includes the guards. My favorite here is the blond second-in-command. Sadly she doesn't have a sex scene of her own. To top it off, this version comes with hardcore elements fully integrated into the whole. On the downside, most of the scenes which should have been sleazy or degrading are here played only for laughs. The two "full-cavity searches" are more funny than erotic. The whipping scenes are so mechanical and perfunctory as to be devoid of any eroticism. The "steamy showers" are more like shower parties. The only violence of real standing are the two instances of sliced penises, one thrown to the dog, the other stuffed into its former owner's mouth. Now, that was worth watching.

The X-rating is justified. We are treated to blowjobs, dildo insertions, strapon action, amd full penetrative sex.

Blue Underground has done a beautiful restoration of this 25 year old film and presents it in its original widescreen aspect of 1.66:1 with anamorphic enhancement. Colors are rich, vibrant and accurate. The picture is sharp and richly detailed. Only an English-dub mono soundtrack has been provided. No other soundtracks are included although the actors are most likely speaking Portuguese and poor lip-synching is very evident throughout. Offering less than what was advertised and less than what I expected, it nevertheless was a fun and enjoyable romp. As a piece of camp cinema it's definitely worth at least a rental.

I agree with the previous reviewer - this is the best WIP flick ever released. It has everything you have come to expect in the genre -but multiply that 3 times! Heavy doses of lez activity - all of it bare of course. Really, can there ever be TOO much lez action in these types of films? I think not. Yes, Bare Behind Bars.....but also Bare Everywhere (behind bars, in the nurses office, in the warden's office, in the prison courtyard, and of course in the multiple shower scenes). Some WIP films promise but don't produce.....this one produces and doesn't stop.

It's amazing that this film was even produced.  Everything about this production is poor.  The young ladies that appear naked in this film are not attractive, the plot is obscure, the scenes in which a sex act is supposed to be taking place are downright silly and totally faked.  It's awful.  Not recommended as it has virtually no redeeming feature.
Best WIP film , near constant nudity, just as twisted and cheesy as it should be.
pretty good if you're looking at WIPs with some story line.  reminded me of 70"s porn-they didn't shave anything back then.
Very original and graphic!
Watched it once. Not much reason to view again. Lots of nudity.

I buy porn for its arousal value, not its entertainment value.  I can forgive a skin flick almost anything if it has at least a few sex scenes that I can "get into".  For me, this one's a zero.  The very few sex scenes are short and hasty.  Hate to give it even one star.  If you enjoy watching groups of women prancing around in rags or naked (not having sex - just prancing), this may be for you. Otherwise, it's a waste of moolah.

This film is about women prisoners, women guards and warden.  A female doctor too.  Naked shower scenes are typical.
Torture scenes inside this prison as to whipping, medical exam.  are on the comic side.  There is no male guard.
Sex scenes as such are girl-on-girl.  However, this movie is X-rated due to the following segments: A male delivery man
gets lucky engaging sex with a woman guard in the store room.  On the run after escaping the prison, one woman is too
violent and inhuman to kill her man.  To the ending, this crazy woman is shot to death by a jealous drunken upon learning
of her making love with a stranger.  As guessed right, all other women are recaptured and returned to prison.
excellent quality. Perfect packaging. Quick forwarding. Moderate price. The film correponds to the standards of quality and was not sbmitted to "scissors"

This movie is excellent movie enjoy but you need a strong stomic to watch so be a wear of the movie it is very sexuality not for kids at all do not bring kids only adults you need a good head to focus enjoy no girl friend recommended  enjoy if girls watch it remember its only a movie not real life .  Powerfully

Bare Behind Bars is a classic women in prison movie.  This has everything you want if you are a fan of this genre of film.  Now, I will say I did give this 5 stars because what it is and it is worth every penny.  There will be some snobs that will turn their noses up at this movie and call it exploitation and says it objectifies women, but let me tell you why would you watch a film like this in the first place knowing that it will be a movie that does just that?  I believe the beautiful women of this film who signed on to do this knew exactly what they were getting into and its fine by me.  The movie starts out with the women behind cages theme and it never stops from there and I MEAN NEVER!  You have 2 shower scenes with 2 women grinding against each other while the guards look on and then go into the shower to stop it!  Wow! Now, if that doesnt do it for ya then you have the star of the film the young girl who is just gorgeous and her body is just splendid! breasts are not that big, but then again who cares?  She goes FULL FRONTAL several times in the film.

  There is nurse who is a deranged killer who uses the women as her objects for her personal fun.  There's a scene where the women that I spoke of earlier is laid out nude on a doctors table and examined thoroughly with her legs spread as if she is about to give birth.  There are numerous scenes that are titilating and erection raising like the scene where the girls are outside excercising completely nude!!! yes! I mean completly nude!  This movie has lesbian scenes too many to count.  A scene where the warden and the young girl have relations again completly naked!!  Torture scenes, hardcore penetration scenes and a rape of a young boy by you guessed it, some of the girls of the film!!

  When I say that this movie is the quintesential women in prison movie I do mean it and I really do!  I have not seen a film before or after this film that even comes close to its standard of over the top nudity and gratuitous sexual content.  If you are a fan of this type of film then buy it NOW!  if not then don't buy it!  its not for you!  I am a purest of this genre from Jess Franco's Ilsa the Wicked Warden to Roger Cormans The big bird cage and I am a fan of all of them, but this clearly sets the tone for all of them even Sadomania cant hold a torch to this(I heard no shower scenes) Escape from Hell, please!  If a Tarantino esk film maker wants to step out there and remake a film of this caliber I say go for it!  Its ripe for it because there is definately an audience for this.  I will hope and pray someone has the balls to do something like this again one day and you know what people it might be me some day, you never know.  Buy this film people it is not for the easily distured or easily offended believe me!  There is a scene towards the end of the film where there are 3 black guys eating watermelon on the side of the street!  Regardless of that foolishness and im black! I still found joy in the film because it gives you what you want and thats over the top nudity, hardcore sex(oral and cunnilingus) lesbian sex, torture scenes, gratuitous sexuality and just plain dirty prison girl things.  Did I mention the 2 shower scenes?  Take my word this is hands down the best WIP ever made!!!!  I Mean EVER!!!

I have the R1 Blue Undeground dvd of Bare Behind Bars and the film hasn't looked better. Anamorphic widescreen and UNCUT.
BBB is far superior to other foreign 'Chicks In Chains' movies. The added porno scenes make the film more sexier of course, but it's a very good Women's prison movie in its own right.
Now when is someone gonna release an UNCUT dvd of CHAINED HEAT with the sexy Sybil Danning and Linda Blair!?

i don't know about art but i know what i like and i like this movie in the first hour there is full nudity about every three minutes tons of nude women then the plot kicks in and the nudity slows down pound for pound this women in prison has more nudity than any other women in prison movie ive ever seen and ive seen lots if you are looking for a good plot there are better chicks i the slamer movies but if you want lots of naked girls get this movie

I've reviewed this before, so there's no point doing so again, except that I note this is said to be the "uncut" version. That's interesting, it probably means the version I posted a review for was the "cut" version, referring to the film rather than the members that probably distinguish the two versions.

In fact, I was reviewing from seeing the uncut version, and therefore I'm guessing the difference is a couple of X rated hardcore scenes during the escape/revenge plot time that occur near the end of the film. If so, you can ignore this version if you already have the old, because the sex really adds nothing of interest for sleaze fans. Who needs to see more of that, considering that 100 such scenes, far superior in quality, are posted on the alt.binaries.erotica newsgroup alone . . . each day??
Think Welles, Godard, Fellini, Greenaway, Robbe-Grillet mixed with a bit of Ford, Tennessee Ernie that is...

This was one of the best WIP movies I have seen for sexual content.  Nothing R about this one, soft X.  Do not try to enjoy as a family movie.  Lots of nudity, g/g sex, some penetration.  You get the idea. Women are not bad looking, some of the sex is hectic, but who cares.  No plot, no dialogue, jumpy camera work but who cares.  But it is somewhat erotic, such as a scene where a young prisoner is ogled voyuer style then sold to an older wealthy woman for "companionship".  Not one you buy for aesthetics but as enjoyable as "Images".

This movie starts out excellent (lots of naked women all the time) but loses a lot of steam when the escape planning starts. Guys especially won't like what happens after the lead women escape. So as not to spoil things, let's just say that guys' "members" don't get treated very well. But the part before the escape is very watchable and enjoyable, with lots and lots of naked women all over the place and plenty of girl-on-girl sex. I enjoyed this movie a lot, up till the escape. Definitely worth getting for solo watching pleasure.
Adult flick with a weak plot. Very typical movie of women behind bars. Not a film for anyone under 18.
